title: Two Nominations Sent to the Senate – The White House
content:
Nominations & Appointments			
Issued on:
January 30, 2019
NOMINATIONS SENT TO THE SENATE:Robert L. King, of Kentucky, to be Assistant Secretary for Postsecondary Education, Department of Education, vice Eduardo M. Ochoa.Mark Schultz, of Nebraska, to be Commissioner of the Rehabilitation Services Administration, Department of Education, vice Janet Lorraine LaBreck.
